title: tUdu nI shenru vADi
sahitya:
(rAgA:  sindhubhairavi)   
  tUdu nI shenru vADi sakhiyE tUyavan pOl naDikkum kaNNaniDam inru


anupallavi

  mAdu orutti unmEl mayyal AghiyE dinam magizhvinri AduginrAL enbadai eDutturaikka
			(rAg  AbhEri)


caraNam 1    nalla mazhai nEram nadikkaraiyin Oram puLLamaNi maNTapattinuLLE tanittirundOm
mella arugil vandil mEni tanai aNaindu sallApam sheidadai sariyAi eDutturaikka
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  bAgEshrI)Aa:S G2 M1 D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 M1 P D2 G2 M1 R2 S  ODum mEgattiDai oLindu nilavu viLaiyADum pOdinilE mAmara shOlaiyilE
ADi viLaiyADiyE avan iru kaigaLilE aDaipaTTas pOdilE avan mozhindadai mozhiya
    caraNam 3  			(rAgA:  shivaranjani)Aa:S R2 G2 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P G2 R2 S  ninaivu taDumAri nirkkirAl sukumAri kaNai vizhit-tuyar Eri kaNNirin nIr Uri
pADugirAL pAvai viragat-tApak-kadai paDavillaiyO sheviyil parandAmanE enru
